column1: #Text=Polycrystalline PrO0.5F0.5BiS2 is synthesized by standard solid state reaction route via vacuum encapsulation.
#Text=High purity Pr, Bi, S, PrF3, and Pr6O11 are weighed in stoichiometric ratio and ground thoroughly in a glove box under high purity argon atmosphere.
#Text=The mixed powders are subsequently palletized and vacuum-sealed (10-4 Torr) in a quartz tube.

#Text=Sealed quartz ampoule is placed in furnace and heat treated at 780 0C for 12h with the typical heating rate of 2oC/min., and subsequently cooled down slowly over a span of six hours to room temperature.
#Text=Thus processed compound was repelletized and sealed in quartz tube and heat treated in similar way.
#Text=X-ray diffraction (XRD) was performed at room temperature using Rigaku Diffractometer with Cu Kα (λ = 1.54Å).
#Text=Rietveld analysis was carried out using the FullProf program.
#Text=Detailed electrical transport, AC/DC magnetization and Heat capacity measurements were performed on Physical Property Measurements System (PPMS-14T), Quantum Design.
